name: Snail Garbaggio
description:
The fastest snail in the world travels 13cm every 10 seconds. Not you though, you’re much slower. Luckily you’re surrounded by nice nutritional garbage. Eat it up all before it gets too much even for your snail belly.

---

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Move to the garbage to eat it and clear the screen.

---

Code & Art by Lu Gossian

Music & Sound by Paul Sharod & Bobbie Sparks
